author: mmdc
content: Hi, I have a question about the transaction fee after merging eth1 and eth2. Does only block proposer receive the fee or it split to all online/attesting validators? In the period both POS and POW running, is miner or validator reward the transaction fee?

author: djrtwo
content: the block producer always gets the value from the txs they choose to include

author: djrtwo
content: pre-merge, this is to the miners

author: djrtwo
content: post, merge this is to the validator

author: djrtwo
content: even during the merge itself, there will be a single chain formed connecting pow to pos. The block producer (miner or validator) for each block on that chain is the one that gets the tx fee value
